Equipment Actions.Action 1: Pseudopod, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Bludgeoning and can adhere to the target
Equipment Actions.Action 2: Bite, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 7 Piercing plus 4 Acid

Abilities.Ability 1: Shapechanger, The Mimic can use its action to polymorph into an object or back into its true, amorphous form
Abilities.Ability 2: Adhesive, The Mimic adheres to anything that touches it, grappling creatures
Abilities.Ability 3: False Appearance, While the Mimic remains, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary object
Abilities.Ability 4: Grappler, The Mimic has advantage on attack rolls against any creature grappled by it
